<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// PHITransAddr - An address value which tracks and handles phi translation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// As we walk &quot;up&quot; the CFG through predecessors, we need to ensure that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// address we&#39;re tracking is kept up to date.  For example, if we&#39;re analyzing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// an address of &quot;&amp;A&#91;i&#93;&quot; and walk through the definition of &#39;i&#39; which is a PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// node, we &#42;must&#42; phi translate i to get &quot;&amp;A&#91;j&#93;&quot; or else we will analyze an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// incorrect pointer in the predecessor block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is designed to be a relatively small object that lives on the stack and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is copyable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
